record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - October 03, 2008)

[Page: H10808]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members may have 5 legislative days to revise and extend their remarks and include extraneous material on the bill just passed by the House.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentlewoman from Colorado?
